Articles.Content:
Hello guys, I have a silly question about add-ons (mods). I am new in add-ons. I installed 146 add-ons by using Ckan. So first question: When I start game KSP-AVC showed 91 add-ons , where is 55 add-ons go or this is normal ? Second question: How can I see which add-ons working or not working ? If ı check individually, it will take a long time. Those are my questions thanks. 

Edit : I forgot to say when ı am using ckan there was no compatibility issue between add-ons.

 

Edited April 18, 2017 by mslost
I forgot to say something
Not all addons use AVC, that's all. It's something the mod author has to add to their mod.

1 minute ago, CobaltWolf said:

Not all addons use AVC, that's all. It's something the mod author has to add to their mod.

Thank you very much have good day sir !

delete all files  Miniavc.* from your game data folder.  That way lies madness.

If your current game is working fine you don't need to update any mods. I've lost many games where I've decided to upgrade a mod to the latest version and it's deleted ships and stations in my career game.

Geh

On 18.04.2017 at 1:54 PM, mslost said:

Hello guys, I have a silly question about add-ons (mods). I am new in add-ons. I installed 146 add-ons by using Ckan. So first question: When I start game KSP-AVC showed 91 add-ons , where is 55 add-ons go or this is normal ? Second question: How can I see which add-ons working or not working ? If ı check individually, it will take a long time. Those are my questions thanks.

146 mods? IMHO that's too much for comfortable playing but it's up to you to decide, of course. Wish you luck.
